attributes.action: concentrate his efforts (and that of his government) on matters that actually matter to the majority of the British public. Instead of wasting vast amounts of time, money and energy looking into how Britain can save the planet (when we only produce 2% of the worlds greenhouse gasses) and rushing to upgrade our nuclear arsenal (at a potential cost of £70bn). Our politicians should instead be working harder to.... 1) Get our children into decent schools. 2) Get the NHS back on track. 3) Sort out the lack of prison spaces. 4) Provide our soldiers with essential equipment and pull out from Iraq. 5) Get a grip on the rapidly growing gun culture of todays youth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: There are a number of individual petitions concerning the issues you have raised. Please use the search mechanism.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
